metadata.title: CVE-2024-5469 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: DoS in KAS in GitLab CE/EE affecting all versions from 16.10.0 prior to16.10.6 and 16.11.0 prior to 16.11.3 allows an attacker to crash KAS viacrafted gRPC requests.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'not maintainable').
